original_text:
CLUEDO Spinning Detectives
Cluedo è uno storico gioco da tavola ideato dalla mente di Anthony Pratt nel 1948 e diffuso da allora in tutto il mondo, edito al giorno d’oggi dalla società statunitense Hasbro.
Il gioco è ambientato in una casa chiamata “Tudor Hall”, rappresentata da un tabellone suddiviso a sua volta in nove stanze. Il proprietario della casa, il dottor Black, viene assassinato e tutti coloro che occupavano la dimora in quel momento sono potenziali indiziati. In questo gioco vince chi risolve il caso, indovinando chi è l’assassino, in quale stanza si è compiuto l’omicidio e quale è stata l’arma del delitto.
Cluedo Spinning Detectives riprende molto fedelmente il noto gioco, sia come grafica che come simbologia. Le linee sono molto asciutte ma nel complesso il compartimento grafico risulta essere molto efficace e dà davvero la sensazione di trovarsi nel gioco originale in versione online.
Caratteristiche principali della slot
Cluedo Spinning Detectives ha una struttura di gioco molto particolare, in quanto a seconda dei simboli che compaiono nella schermata principale, il gioco si sposta in una delle cinque stanze (a differenza delle 9 nel gioco da tavolo) della Tudor Hall, secondo il seguente schema:

SERRA (CONSERVATORY) – Rullo 1
SALA DA BILIARDO (BILLIARD ROOM) – Rullo 2
BIBLIOTECA (LIBRARY) – Rullo 3
CUCINA (KITCHEN) – Rullo 4
SALA DA PRANZO (DINING ROOM) – Rullo 5

Ognuna di queste cinque stanze si caratterizza poi per una diversa funzionalità, con bonus e tanti giri gratuiti oltre che, ovviamente, con numerose e variegate possibilità di vincita.
Parlando invece in termini più generici, vediamo che Cluedo Spinning Detectives presenta una struttura di base caratterizzata da cinque rulli e 40 linee di pagamento.
La volatilità di questa slot machine è piuttosto alta e ciò si traduce da una parte in vincite non troppo frequenti, dall’altra in premi che potranno raggiungere anche delle cifre di tutto rispetto.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP) di Cluedo Spinning Detectives è stabilito al 96,06%. Non si tratta di certo di una percentuale da capogiro, ma si può considerare accettabile, essendo in linea con quella della maggior parte dei giochi di slot che si possono trovare nei casinò online.
Simboli di Cluedo Spinning Detectives
Sui rulli di Cluedo Spinning Detectives potrete trovare sia i simboli tematici sia i cosiddetti reali, ossia i numeri e le lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco, in questo caso solo dal J all’Asso.
I simboli più propriamente tematici sono molto fedeli alle dinamiche del noto gioco da tavolo: troviamo quindi la lente d’ingrandimento, il logo Stanze Bonus, che quando compare sul primo, terzo e quinto rullo consente di ottenere ben 7 giri gratuiti nella  stanza corrispondente, il punto interrogativo, che attiva un mini gioco, e infine il logo Clue che è il Wild del gioco, ha funzione di jolly e come tale può sostituire tutti gli altri simboli per il completamento di una combinazione vincente.
Verdetto
Cluedo Spinning Detectives è un gioco divertente e non convenzionale, che si discosta dalla tradizione delle slot machine in virtù del gameplay articolato e originale.
L’alta volatilità lo rende perfetto per i giocatori che vanno a caccia di ricchi tesori e non si accontentano di premi piccoli e frequenti. Lo consigliamo se avete già una certa esperienza nei giochi di slot!

raw_translation.response:
CLUEDO Spinning Detectives - A Classic Game Revived in Slot Form

Cluedo is a classic board game created by Anthony Pratt in 1948 and has since become popular around the world, now published by the American company Hasbro. The game is set in a house called "Tudor Hall," depicted on a board divided into nine rooms. The owner of the house, Dr. Black, is murdered, and all those who were in the house at the time are potential suspects. The winner is the one who solves the case, guessing who the killer is, in which room the murder occurred, and what was the murder weapon.

Cluedo Spinning Detectives faithfully captures the famous game in both graphics and symbolism. The lines are minimalistic, but overall, the graphics are effective, giving players the sensation that they are playing the original board game online. 

The slot game has a unique gameplay structure where, depending on the symbols that appear on the main screen, the game moves to one of five rooms in Tudor Hall, instead of nine in the board game. These rooms have different functionalities, such as bonuses and free spins, providing numerous and varied possibilities for players to win. Additionally, the game structure is five reels and 40 pay lines, offering high volatility and prizes that can reach impressive numbers.

The return to player (RTP) ratio of Cluedo Spinning Detectives is set at 96.06%, which is not an extraordinary percentage, but it is acceptable, in line with most online slot games. Furthermore, the game's symbols consist of both thematic and royal symbols, with the thematic ones being loyal to the dynamics of the board game, such as the magnifying glass, the Stanze Bonus logo, the interrogation point, and the Clue logo, serving as the wild symbol that can replace any other symbol to complete a winning combination.

In conclusion, Cluedo Spinning Detectives is a fun and unconventional game that deviates from traditional slot machines due to its original and intricate gameplay. It is recommended for experienced gamblers who are looking for big wins and do not settle for frequent small prizes.

Review: CLUEDO Spinning Detectives - A Classic Game Revived in Slot Form

Cluedo is a classic board game created by Anthony Pratt in 1948 and has since become popular around the world, now published by the American company Hasbro. The game is set in a house called "Tudor Hall," depicted on a board divided into nine rooms. The owner of the house, Dr. Black, is murdered, and all those who were in the house at the time are potential suspects. The winner is the one who solves the case, guessing who the killer is, in which room the murder occurred, and what was the murder weapon.

Cluedo Spinning Detectives faithfully captures the famous game in both graphics and symbolism. The lines are minimalistic, but overall, the graphics are effective, giving players the sensation that they are playing the original board game online. 

The slot game has a unique gameplay structure where, depending on the symbols that appear on the main screen, the game moves to one of five rooms in Tudor Hall, instead of nine in the board game. These rooms have different functionalities, such as bonuses and free spins, providing numerous and varied possibilities for players to win. Additionally, the game structure is five reels and 40 pay lines, offering high volatility and prizes that can reach impressive numbers.

The return to player (RTP) ratio of Cluedo Spinning Detectives is set at 96.06%, which is not an extraordinary percentage, but it is acceptable, in line with most online slot games. Furthermore, the game's symbols consist of both thematic and royal symbols, with the thematic ones being loyal to the dynamics of the board game, such as the magnifying glass, the Stanze Bonus logo, the interrogation point, and the Clue logo, serving as the wild symbol that can replace any other symbol to complete a winning combination.

In conclusion, Cluedo Spinning Detectives is a fun and unconventional game that deviates from traditional slot machines due to its original and intricate gameplay. It is recommended for experienced gamblers who are looking for big wins and do not settle for frequent small prizes.

The game is set in a house called "Tudor Hall," depicted on a board divided into nine rooms. The owner of the house, Dr. Black, is murdered, and all those who were in the house at the time are potential suspects. The winner is the one who solves the case, guessing who the killer is, in which room the murder occurred, and what was the murder weapon.

Cluedo Spinning Detectives faithfully captures the famous game in both graphics and symbolism. The lines are minimalistic, but overall, the graphics are effective, giving players the sensation that they are playing the original board game online. 

The slot game has a unique gameplay structure where, depending on the symbols that appear on the main screen, the game moves to one of five rooms in Tudor Hall, instead of nine in the board game. These rooms have different functionalities, such as bonuses and free spins, providing numerous and varied possibilities for players to win. Additionally, the game structure is five reels and 40 pay lines, offering high volatility and prizes that can reach impressive numbers.

The return to player (RTP) ratio of Cluedo Spinning Detectives is set at 96.06%, which is not an extraordinary percentage, but it is acceptable, in line with most online slot games. Furthermore, the game's symbols consist of both thematic and royal symbols, with the thematic ones being loyal to the dynamics of the board game, such as the magnifying glass, the Stanze Bonus logo, the interrogation point, and the Clue logo, serving as the wild symbol that can replace any other symbol to complete a winning combination.

In conclusion, Cluedo Spinning Detectives is a fun and unconventional game that deviates from traditional slot machines due to its original and intricate gameplay. It is recommended for experienced gamblers who are looking for big wins and do not settle for frequent small prizes.
